about_me: Senior software engineer based out of the Pacific Northwest with a love for spicy food, vinyl, metal, DnB and hacking on things. I like game dev, web dev, distributed systems, GPU programming and architecture. I approach things from a holistic application perspective, not zeroing in on any one domain. Welcome to the blog!
about_me_summary: Dev with a passion for language design, building things and random sh!t.
author: Eric Olson

projects.title: blog_gen
projects.description: A compiler which transforms a collection of markdown files into a static website.

projects.title: blog
projects.description: A collection of thoughts and project updates.

projects.title: benchy
projects.description: A crate used for profiling Rust applications.

projects.title: ChickenTest
projects.description: Unit testing framework for Chicken Scheme.

projects.title: DemoC
projects.description: A simple C program that runs a Scheme interpreter. Runs on Mac, Windows and Linux.

projects.title: Development environment
projects.description: A repository for my development environment.

projects.title: ex_duktape_to_rust
projects.description: An example for binding a C library (Duktape) to Rust and exposing it.

projects.title: g_logger
projects.description: A library used for game related logging in dev builds. It provides a way to log events and replay them.

projects.title: g_time
projects.description: A library used for game related time functionality. The main piece is a timer class that abstracts common functionality.

projects.title: GoForthAndProsper
projects.description: A minimal example for a Forth compiler written in Rust.

projects.title: Heimdall
projects.description: A hot reloading crate for Rust.

projects.title: Realtime CPU Raytracer
projects.description: A real time CPU raytracer that dynamically scales the image based on frame rate.

projects.title: Rusty Mon0game
projects.description: A Monogame inspired engine in Rust.

projects.title: ToyPaymentEngine
projects.description: A toy payment engine built for a code challenge. Written in Rust and parses a CSV.
